archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0663
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a consumer, I want to choose specific delivery options for my hardware delivery, so that I can get it at a time that suits me. E.g. Saturdays, after hours.

properties.value: Could be OOTB as additional parameters for delivery items, then depents on fulfilment, e.g. courier company (integration?). To be discussed with the Terminals team. "Saturday" would be a separate delivery option available for certain geo areas.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
